channel.title: Trax Rota synth
channel.description: Hello, i've got a Trax Rota Synth and try to recreate it. http://www.matrixsynth.com/2010/09/trax-rs-1-rota-synth-analogue-sequencer.html It's sync with external midi and is control by a BCR2000. http://dl.free.fr/bax4kMZMb [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/ZrvHWsf5FjNm-khX9pCBTxG34EmrLzcCZomc-ytiIqalb3G7VvSGWNJuUGakaeGFGg9U2pWjG5LvvC9ThvHberGMNXKyQ3STM3NZbQXs6Ko7eThO0044XP6-EhtyHCt9HXw2LZ8XmLG6yC1l5DaWyYilCpytxunwwzkfVpJoelCjpMsQ3sdtxocnAlcrP8ARl_ke-CX3pdAFrHGMRTQBfuondCbtgzOzWtLK8D3Et3Oz-u_UFSEjrvG6WQjd9b3rhLql3_Ghxdif7eiqERLe87QdHok3m5lHRby41Dz0BD-njVEpTk7Orm0gTnTHVtPxhbbpYvkRKLxEBIk0d1S3GztjigalrVdkFuJN4KJ9xui6iFihbzdQJOl0k84sjyfwRUY6B3l1aId4SBjwHaFGGuXLOnz0sBpDu93Gmjc2YF5JecLB5YeJt-Ozqm4-K06NXSusaRvpKmcqAy90e2O211yhUh_cEE2_GI6NO_WNiGp5LuRunypaC0_Ygt8fTKA6UZ098ldxlAlROGra0ZIUaElKUn81oKzLcei_qCS2l0VnM36ysxnFSnaoOFXucesdCZmC=w596-h790-no[/img]

item.title: Trax Rota synth
item.dc:creator: @mongrol
item.description:
@mongrol wrote:

2nd image is broken. That looks great though and as I've just settled on a panel design for my synth after lots of deliberation, fancy synth panel's is the last thing I want to see.

Read full topic

item.title: Trax Rota synth
item.dc:creator: @boulooban
item.description:
@boulooban wrote:

Hello, i've got a Trax Rota Synth and try to recreate it.
http://www.matrixsynth.com/2010/09/trax-rs-1-rota-synth-analogue-sequencer.html


It's sync with external midi and is control by a BCR2000.

http://dl.free.fr/bax4kMZMb
